news.title: Anthropic adds Allianz to growing list of enterprise wins
news.summary: Anthropic announces its first enterprise deal of 2026 which includes building agents and for, and giving Claude code, to Allianz.

news.title: CES 2026: Everything revealed, from Nvidia’s debuts to AMD’s new chips to Razer’s AI oddities
news.summary: CES 2026 is in full swing in Las Vegas, with the show floor open to the public after a packed couple of days occupied by press conferences from the likes of Nvidia, Sony, and AMD and previews from Sunday’s Unveiled event.

news.title: Data security startup Cyera hits $9B valuation six months after being valued at $6B
news.summary: Cyera raised another $400 million just six months after its last huge round.

news.title: Governments grapple with the flood of non-consensual nudity on X
news.summary: For the past two weeks, X has been flooded with AI-manipulated nude images, created by the Grok AI chatbot — and governments around the world are promising to take action.

news.title: GTMfund has rewritten the distribution playbook for the AI era
news.summary: Building software products has never been easier, so why are so many well-funded startups failing to take off no matter how good their product is? news.title: The Verge Awards at CES 2026
news.summary: Every January, the world of consumer electronics heads to Las Vegas to spend the first full week of the year in the desert presenting, prodding, and gawking at all the new gadgets and gear debuting at CES. news.title: Microsoft is making it much easier to add hyperlinks in Word docs
news.summary: Microsoft is making it a lot faster and easier to add links to text inside Word documents. Instead of having to open a menu item to insert a link or use the CTRL + K keyboard shortcut, you can now simply paste a link on top of the text you want to hyperlink. This new […]

news.title: Xbox’s Towerborne is switching from a free-to-play game to a paid one
news.summary: Towerborne, a side-scrolling action RPG published by Xbox Game Studios that has been available in early access, will officially launch on February 26th. news.title: The best Apple Watch to buy
news.summary: If you have an iPhone, the Apple Watch is the best smartwatch for you. But there was only one Apple Watch when the smartwatch launched in 2015. news.title: NASA orders “controlled medical evacuation” from the International Space Station
news.summary: "The crew is highly trained, and they came to the aid of their colleague right away."

news.title: Michigan man learns the hard way that “catch a cheater” spyware apps aren’t legal
news.summary: Spying doesn't become legal just because "cheaters" are the targets.

news.title: Wi-Fi advocates get win from FCC with vote to allow higher-power devices
news.summary: FCC says new category of devices "can operate outdoors and at higher power."

news.title: High RAM prices mean record-setting profits for Samsung and other memory makers
news.summary: SK Hynix and Micron are also riding high on the AI industry's demand for RAM.

news.title: RFK Jr.’s dietary guidance: Food funnel features slab of red meat, butter
news.summary: Old-school food pyramid returns, but jumbled and upside-down, like a funnel.

news.title: Conservative Lawmakers Want Porn Taxes. Critics Say They’re Unconstitutional
news.summary: Alabama passed a 10 percent porn tax last year, as Utah and Pennsylvania eye similar bills. Half the country has enacted age-verification laws to prevent minors from viewing porn.

news.title: ‘Physical AI’ Is Coming for Your Car
news.summary: What the latest tech-marketing buzzword has to say about the future of automotive.

news.title: Burtran Nano-Oxy Smart Air Purifier: Safe Sleep?
news.summary: This negative-oxygen-ion-generating purifier claims to create a “forestlike atmosphere” in your bedroom.

news.title: Crispr Pioneer Launches Startup to Make Tailored Gene-Editing Treatments
news.summary: Aurora Therapeutics, cofounded by Nobel Prize–winning scientist Jennifer Doudna, plans to use gene editing and a new FDA regulatory pathway to commercialize treatments for rare diseases.

news.title: The Oceans Just Keep Getting Hotter
news.summary: For the eighth year in a row, the world’s oceans absorbed a record-breaking amount of heat in 2025. It was equivalent to the energy it would take to boil 2 billion Olympic swimming pools.
